no shit.translation[0].definitions[0].de: used to express surprise or to check whether what someone has just said is true
no shit.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: ‘I can get you one for $50.’ ‘No shit?’
no shit.translation[0].definitions[1].de: used to emphasize that what you are saying is true, or to agree that what someone else says is true
no shit.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: They had like, no shit, 40 different kinds of beer.
